1.3.name: wordpress/super-tags-widget
1.3.description: The Super Tags plugin, is a customizable alternative to the default WordPress® Tag Cloud widget. This widget makes it possible for you to fully customize a Tag Cloud ( or multiple Tag Clouds ) to meet your specific needs. It takes the same options as the wp_tag_cloud() function. You can specify a number of configurable parameters, such as: minimum font size, maximum font size, maximum tags to display, format ( flat|list ), separators, order, sort method, specific tags to include, specific tags to exclude, or even a specific taxonomy ( post_tag|category|link_category ).
